viewData.name: LG LH4830 24" Class HD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG LH4830 24" Class HD Smart LED TV featuring HD 1366 x 768 LED Panel, Screen Mirroring Technology Built-In Wi-Fi & Ethernet Connectivity. Review LG LH4830
viewData.long_description: Enjoy high-definition content with the LG LH4830- 24" Class HD Smart LED TV. This 23.6" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 1366 x 768, allowing you to view detailed 720p HD images, and its anti-glare coating helps reduce glare in bright rooms. As a smart TV with Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity, you'll be able to download apps and games. Its two HDMI inputs will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
